title: Cannot sync a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to sync a .java file and another resource, the context menu does not contain the 'Team' entry.
OB: The bug report states that when trying to sync a .java file and another resource, the context menu is missing the 'Team' entry.
EB: To reproduce the issue, open the context menu and confirm that the 'Team' entry is not displayed. It should be present in the context menu when syncing a .java file and another resource.
SR: Add the 'Team' entry to the context menu when syncing a .java file and another resource.
